sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>3</base_damage> <critical_rating>2</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>Gamorreans, particularly those employed by the notorious Hutts, often carry meter-long axes fitted with vibration technology. Most are very heavy and suited only for beings of considerable strength, and usually with a low center of gravity (particularly tall or elegant beings have trouble swinging the heavy axes without throwing themselves off-balance).  The damage a vibro-ax causes is tremendous and messy. The impact area suffers massive and deep trauma from the blade and the vibration. Because of this, wounds caused by vibro-axes are particularly nastyâ€”hence the high damage and Critical Hit chance.  A vibro-ax requires two hands to wield.  Models Include: SoroSuub BD-1 Cutter Vibro-Ax.</description> <encumbrance>4</encumbrance> <hard_points>3</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Vibro-ax</name> <number>GEAR0001032</number> <price>750</price> <range>engaged</range> <rarity>5</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Melee (Br)">0c90dd5cdbae88542901de90cf9619a4</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 16:15:35</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2e47f2e82f50a450e0f497eef699b657</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 16:15:35</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
